revised_title: Odd Zonal Harmonics in the Geopotential: Determination from Satellite Orbits
tldr: Researchers analyzed the oscillations in the orbital eccentricity of 14 satellites to evaluate the odd zonal harmonics in Earth's gravitational potential. They found the best representation of these harmonics using 7 or 10 coefficients and provided values for these coefficients. This study improved the understanding of Earth's gravitational field and its variations with latitude.
